get.summary: Returns a paginated list of AP bills with detailed item information, filtering capabilities, and associated metadata
get.description: Returns a paginated list of AP bills with detailed item information, filtering capabilities, and associated metadata

parameters.name: tenant
parameters.description: Tenant ID

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of specific AP bill IDs to retrieve

parameters.name: batchId
parameters.description: Filter by specific batch ID

parameters.name: batchNumber
parameters.description: Filter by batch number

parameters.name: billNumber
parameters.description: Filter by bill number (partial match supported)

parameters.name: businessUnitIds
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of business unit IDs to filter by

parameters.name: customField.Fields
parameters.description: Dictionary of name-value pairs

parameters.name: customField.Operator
parameters.description:
Operator to be used between the name-value pairs. Can be "Or" or "And", default is "And".\
Values: [And, Or]

parameters.name: dateFrom
parameters.description: Filter bills created on or after this date

parameters.name: dateTo
parameters.description: Filter bills created on or before this date

parameters.name: jobNumber
parameters.description: Filter by job number (partial match supported)

parameters.name: purchaseOrderNumber
parameters.description: Filter by purchase order number (partial match supported)

parameters.name: purchaseOrderTypes
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of purchase order types to filter by

parameters.name: syncStatuses
parameters.description: Filter by sync status values

parameters.name: statuses
parameters.description: Filter by bill status values

parameters.name: sources
parameters.description: Filter by bill source values

parameters.name: minCost
parameters.description: Filter bills with cost greater than or equal to this amount

parameters.name: maxCost
parameters.description: Filter bills with cost less than or equal to this amount

parameters.name: billType
parameters.description:
Filter by bill type (defaults to Procurement)\
Values: [NotSet, Procurement, ApBill]

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The logical number of page to return, starting from 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: How many records to return (50 by default)

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: Return items created before certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: createdOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Return items created on or after certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: modifiedBefore
parameters.description: Return items modified before certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: modifiedOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Return items modified on or after certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: includeTotal
parameters.description: Whether total count should be returned

200.description: Successfully retrieved the paginated list of AP bills

400.description: The request cannot be processed, check validation errors or request format

get.description: Returns a single AP bill by its unique identifier with complete details including items, expense items, and associated metadata

parameters.name: billId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the AP bill to retrieve

parameters.name: tenant
parameters.description: Tenant ID

400.description: The request cannot be processed, check validation errors or request format

404.description: AP bill with the specified ID was not found

get.summary: Provides export feed for invoices
get.description: Provides export feed for invoices

parameters.name: tenant
parameters.description: Tenant ID

parameters.name: from
parameters.description:
Continuation token received from previous export request in "continueFrom" field.
When not specified, the export process starts from the beginning.\
Use custom date strings, e.g. "2020-01-01" to start the export process from the certain point in time.

parameters.name: includeRecentChanges
parameters.description:
Use "true" to start receiving the most recent changes quicker.
Note this may cause the same results appearing multiple times on consecutive requests.

400.description: The request cannot be processed, check validation errors or request format

get.description: Provides export feed for invoice items

parameters.name: tenant
parameters.description: Tenant ID

parameters.name: from

When not specified, the export process starts from the beginning.\
Use custom date strings, e.g. "2020-01-01" to start the export process from the certain point in time.

parameters.name: includeRecentChanges
parameters.description:
Use "true" to start receiving the most recent changes quicker.
Note this may cause the same results appearing multiple times on consecutive requests.

data.description: string

400.description: The request cannot be processed, check validation errors or request format

get.summary: Retrieves General Ledger accounts that match the given criteria
get.description: Retrieves General Ledger accounts that match the given criteria

parameters.name: tenant
parameters.description: Tenant ID

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of account IDs, maximum 50 items

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of account names, maximum 50 items

parameters.name: numbers
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of account numbers, maximum 50 items

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of account types, maximum 50 items

parameters.name: subtypes
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of account subtypes, maximum 50 items

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: A substring that must be contained in the account description

parameters.name: source
parameters.description:
Account source\
Values: [Undefined, AccountingSystem, ManuallyCreated, PublicApi]

parameters.name: active
parameters.description:
Specify if only active accounts, only inactive accounts, or both, should be retrieved.
By default, only active accounts will be retrieved.\
Values: [True, Any, False]

parameters.name: isIntacctGroup
parameters.description: Set to true to retrieve Intacct group accounts only

parameters.name: isIntacctBankAccount
parameters.description: Set to true to retrieve Intacct bank accounts only

parameters.name: modifiedBefore
parameters.description: Return items modified before certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: modifiedOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Return items modified on or after certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: Return items created before certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: createdOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Return items created on or after certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The logical number of page to return, starting from 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: How many records to return (50 by default)

parameters.name: includeTotal
parameters.description: Whether total count should be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Applies sorting by specified fields

200.description: A collection of General Ledger accounts that match the given criteria.

data.name: string
data.description: string

400.description: The request cannot be processed, check validation errors or request format

requestBody.description: General Ledger account data that must be updated

get.summary: Retrieves a list of invoices.  By default, all invoices will be returned regardless of status.
get.description: Retrieves a list of invoices.  By default, all invoices will be returned regardless of status.

parameters.name: tenant
parameters.description: Tenant ID

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of invoice IDs.

parameters.name: activeState
parameters.description: Values: [ActiveOnly, InactiveOnly, All]

parameters.name: modifiedBefore
parameters.description: Return items modified before certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: modifiedOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Return items modified on or after certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: statuses
parameters.description:
Transaction status, which can be one of: Pending, Posted, Exported.
By default, all transaction statuses are included.  If you want to filter by more
than one status, add a new "statuses" query parameter for each status you want to include.
For example: &statuses=Pending&statuses=Posted

parameters.name: batchId
parameters.description: Batch ID associated with invoices.

parameters.name: batchNumber
parameters.description: Batch number associated with invoices.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The logical number of page to return, starting from 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: How many records to return (50 by default)

parameters.name: customField.Fields
parameters.description: Dictionary of name-value pairs

parameters.name: customField.Operator
parameters.description:
Operator to be used between the name-value pairs. Can be "Or" or "And", default is "And".\
Values: [And, Or]

parameters.name: includeTotal
parameters.description: Whether total count should be returned

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: Job ID associated with invoices. This will be null if the invoice is not linked to a job.

parameters.name: jobNumber
parameters.description: Job number associated with invoices. This will be null if the invoice is not linked to a job.

parameters.name: businessUnitId
parameters.description: Business unit ID associated with invoices.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Customer ID associated with invoices.

parameters.name: adjustmentToId
parameters.description: When searching for adjustment invoices, this field will search for invoices that are adjustments to the specified invoice ID.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Reference number associated with invoices.

parameters.name: createdOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Return items created on or after certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: Return items created before certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: totalGreater
parameters.description: Retrieve all invoices with a total greater than or equal to the input value.

parameters.name: totalLess
parameters.description: Retrieve all invoices with a total less than or equal to the input value.

parameters.name: balanceFilter.Comparer
parameters.description: Values: [Equals, NotEquals, Greater, Less]

parameters.name: dueDateBefore
parameters.description: Retrieve all invoices with a due date before the input value

parameters.name: dueDateOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Retrieve all invoices with a due date on after or equal the input value

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Field on which you want to order the returned list of invoices.

parameters.name: orderByDirection
parameters.description: Order direction of the retuned list of invoices.  Values of "desc" or "descending" will order the list in descending order, otherwise the list will be ordered in ascending order.

parameters.name: reviewStatuses
parameters.description: Review statuses associated with invoices.

parameters.name: assignedToIds
parameters.description: AssignedTo IDs associated with invoices.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Applies sorting by the specified field:\
"?sort=+FieldName" for ascending order,\
"?sort=-FieldName" for descending order.\

400.description: The request cannot be processed, check validation errors or request format

parameters.name: tenant
parameters.description: Tenant ID

400.description: The request cannot be processed, check validation errors or request format

patch.description: Updates custom fields for specified invoices

parameters.name: tenant
parameters.description: Tenant ID

400.description: The request cannot be processed, check validation errors or request format

get.summary: Gets a list of journal entries.
get.description: Gets a list of journal entries.

parameters.name: tenant
parameters.description: Tenant ID

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of journal entry IDs, maximum 50 items

parameters.name: exportedFrom
parameters.description: Exported on or after certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: exportedTo
parameters.description: Exported on or before certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: postedFrom
parameters.description: Posted on or after certain date (time is ignored)

parameters.name: postedTo
parameters.description: Posted on or before certain date (time is ignored)

parameters.name: modifiedBefore
parameters.description: Return items modified before certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: modifiedOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Return items modified on or after certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: Return items created before certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: createdOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Return items created on or after certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: exportedBy
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of user IDs, maximum 50 items

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name contains

parameters.name: numberFrom
parameters.description: Number is greater or equal than

parameters.name: numberTo
parameters.description: Number is less or equal to

parameters.name: statuses
parameters.description: Array of statuses

parameters.name: syncStatuses
parameters.description: Array of sync statuses

parameters.name: transactionPostedFrom
parameters.description: Contains a transaction posted on or after certain date (time is ignored)

parameters.name: transactionPostedTo
parameters.description: Contains a transaction posted on or before certain date (time is ignored)

parameters.name: businessUnitIds
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of business unit IDs, maximum 50 items

parameters.name: serviceAgreementIds
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of service agreement IDs, maximum 50 items

parameters.name: customerName
parameters.description: Contains a transaction for a customer with name containing

parameters.name: locationName
parameters.description: Contains a transaction for a customer location with name containing

parameters.name: vendorName
parameters.description: Contains a transaction for a vendor with name containing

parameters.name: inventoryLocationName
parameters.description: Contains a transaction for an inventory location with name containing

parameters.name: refNumber
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of reference numbers, maximum 50 items

parameters.name: transactionTypes
parameters.description:
List of transaction types.\
A journal entry will be returned if it contains at least one transaction of this type.

parameters.name: customField
parameters.description:
Filter by custom fields associated with journal entries.\
Example: ?customField.fieldName1=value1&customField.fieldName2=value2\
A field with null value, and a non-existent field are treated equally.\
Maximum 5 custom fields are supported in one request.

parameters.name: empty
parameters.description:
Indicates whether empty journal entries should be included in journal entry query results.\
This argument doesn't have effect when journal entries are requested by their ids,\
in which case empty journal entries are never excluded.\
Values: [IncludeExceptNotSynced, Include, Exclude]

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Applies sorting by the specified field and direction.\
Options: Id, Number, Name, Status, CreatedOn, ExportedOn, ExportedBy, PostDate.\
Use "+" for ascending order, and "-" for descending order.\
Example: "?sort=-Number" will sort by number in descending order.\

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: How many records to return (50 by default). Maximum value is 500.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The logical number of page to return, starting from 1

parameters.name: includeTotal
parameters.description: Whether total count should be returned

400.description: The request cannot be processed, check validation errors or request format

id.description: Unique identifier for the AP bill

purchaseOrderId.description: Associated purchase order ID, if applicable

syncStatus.description: Current synchronization status of the bill (e.g., Pending, Posted, Exported)

status.description: Current status of the bill (e.g., Unreconciled, Reconciled, Discrepancy, Canceled)

source.description: Source of the bill creation (e.g., Standalone, Purchasing, API, OCR)

billType.description: Type of the bill (e.g., Procurement, ApBill)

postDate.description: Date when the bill was posted to the accounting system

summary.description: Brief summary or description of the bill

billDate.description: Date of the bill as specified by the vendor

earlyDiscountDate.description: Date by which early payment discount can be applied

billAmount.description: Total amount of the bill as a formatted string

vendorInvoiceTotal.description: Total amount from the vendor's invoice as a formatted string

taxAmount.description: Tax amount as a formatted string

shippingAmount.description: Shipping amount as a formatted string

createdBy.description: Name of the user who created the bill

createdOn.description: Date and time when the bill was created

modifiedOn.description: Date and time when the bill was last modified

termName.description: Name of the payment terms applied to this bill

dueDate.description: Due date for payment of the bill

doNotPay.description: Indicates whether this bill should not be paid (hold status)

dateCanceled.description: Date when the bill was canceled, if applicable

canceledBy.description: Information about who canceled the bill

batch.description: Batch information if the bill is part of a batch

businessUnit.description: Business unit associated with the bill

taxZone.description: Tax zone information for tax calculations

remittanceVendorInfo.description: Remittance vendor information for payment processing

budgetCodeId.description: Budget code ID associated with the bill

items.description: List of line items on the bill (materials and equipment)

expenseItems.description: List of expense items on the bill

customFields.description: Custom field values associated with the bill

jobId.description: Job ID associated with the bill, if applicable

jobNumber.description: Job number associated with the bill, if applicable

Accounting.V2.ApBillResponse.description: Represents a complete AP bill with all associated details, items, and metadata

order.description: Display order of the item on the bill

name.description: Name of the item (material or equipment)

description.description: Detailed description of the item (may contain HTML formatting)

quantity.description: Quantity of the item as a formatted string

cost.description: Cost per unit as a formatted string

inventoryLocation.description: Inventory location where the item is stored

vendorPartNumber.description: Vendor's part number for the item

serialNumber.description: Serial number of the item, if applicable

generalLedgerAccount.description: General ledger account information for accounting purposes

costOfSaleAccount.description: Cost of sale account information for accounting purposes

assetAccount.description: Asset account information for accounting purposes

id.description: Unique identifier for the bill item

receiptItemId.description: Associated receipt item ID, if applicable

budgetCodeId.description: Budget code ID associated with the item

Accounting.V2.ApBillItemResponse.description: Represents a line item on an AP bill, containing material or equipment details

id.description: Unique identifier for the inventory location

type.description: Type of inventory location (e.g., Warehouse, Truck, etc.)

Accounting.V2.InventoryLocationResponse.description: Represents an inventory location where items are stored

id.description: Unique identifier for the expense item

amount.description: Amount of the expense as a formatted string

generalLedgerAccount.description: General ledger account information for the expense

job.description: Job associated with the expense, if applicable

businessUnit.description: Business unit associated with the expense

budgetCodeId.description: Budget code ID associated with the expense

projectLabelIds.description: List of project label IDs associated with the expense

Accounting.V2.ApBillExpenseItemResponse.description: Represents an expense item on an AP bill for non-inventory costs

type.description: A URI reference that identifies the problem type

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type

status.description: The HTTP status code generated by server

traceId.description: Internal trace ID for advanced diagnostics

errors.description: Provides more details about errors occurred, which can potentially be used for visual display

data.description: Provides additional data, intended for programmatical usage

ApiErrorResponse.description: Detailed error response, following RFC 7807 recommendations (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7807).

Accounting.V2.ApBillSyncStatus.description:
Defines the synchronization status of an AP bill with external accounting systems
Values: Pending (0), Posted (1), Exported (2), PostedAndExported (3)

Accounting.V2.ApBillStatus.description:
Defines the reconciliation status of an AP bill
Values: Unreconciled (0), Reconciled (1), Discrepancy (2), Canceled (3)

Accounting.V2.ApBillSource.description:
Defines the source or origin of an AP bill creation
Values: Undefined (0), Standalone (1), Purchasing (2), Recurring (3), OCR (4), API (5)

Accounting.V2.ApBillType.description:
Defines the type of AP bill
Values: NotSet (0), Procurement (1), ApBill (2)

hasMore.description:
Indicates whether the export feed has reached its logical "end", or if there is more to export.
True means the consumer can invoke another request right away using new continuation token value.
False means there is now new data for the export, and the consumer should wait for some time (5-10 minutes)
before making another request.

continueFrom.description: Continuation token used to resume the export operation. The value should be used in "from" query parameter of the following request.

data.description: The collection of exported items, usually sorted chronologically based on modification date
